trends: There have been no other sightings in Toulouse
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am currently seeing a light which is round in shape moving on the clouds. The light is moving in the same circle for the last 30 mins. However is visible only on the clouds, when there is no clouds i see two shining points similar to a star, static. There are two spot lights moving in two different elliptical radii one larger than the other. However both lights are criss-crossing in the elliptical. I am unable to picture this as my camera is not able to take pics of the night sky !!
Summary: Spot light on a cloud moving in elliptical form
